The 2024 Alabama Democratic presidential primary took place on March 5, 2024, as part of the Democratic Party primaries for the 2024 presidential election. 59 delegates to the Democratic National Convention were allocated to presidential candidates. The contest was held on Super Tuesday alongside primaries in 14 other states and territories.
Biden won the primary in a landslide and received all 52 delegates.
Candidates
The following candidates have been certified to appear on the ballot in Alabama.
* Joe Biden
* Dean Phillips
* Uncommitted
